column5: Here is the forecast for south of the Rock tonight.  How many driftsocks should I let out????     Waves Issued 05:00 PM ADT 23 August 2009 Tonight and Monday  Seas 9 to 12 metres subsiding to 8 to 11 early this evening and to 4 to 6 after midnight. Seas subsiding to 3 to 4 Monday morning and to 2 Monday evening.
9-12 meter seas.  Depending on your boat size I wouldn't go any smaller than a 42" sock.  lol!
Its also the highest tide of the year tonight.  The newfs can tuff er' out.  S.
That'll be perfect chop fer cod jiggin'
I'd start with a queen size sheet and then add another if needed.
One standard-sized parachute should do the trick.
yea that sounds like Lake Erie this year..  Surf's up
